mapper.insert: insert into reple (repleIdx, originIdx, masterID, repleID, reple, repleIp, fix, repleNickName, repleGender, repleAge, repleLimitNum) values (reple_idx_seq.nextval, #{originIdx}, #{masterID}, #{repleID}, #{reple}, #{repleIp}, #{fix}, #{repleNickName}, #{repleGender}, #{repleAge}, #{repleLimitNum})
mapper.update: update reple set fix = 'Y' where repleIdx = #{repleIdx}
mapper.select: select * from reple where originIdx = #{originIdx} order by repleIdx desc
